name: LAB (ZMastah, Knaree)
description:
Horror game where you are dropped to secret laboratory which holds mysterious singularity within.

Singularity moves only when you aren't looking, when you blink it moves faster!

Made within a few days for: https://itch.io/jam/scream-jam-2021

Kinda big bug which got left in the jam version of the game due to time constraints: The enemy can spawn invisible... whoops :)
